metadata.name: AMOR x 1
metadata.description:
AMOR x 1 - CORNER 

«What should we look for beyond the surface?» 

1/1 NFT x PHYSICAL (Physical and Virtual) 

AMOR x 1 - CORNER is a Unique Element of the Digital Landscape / AMOR MUNDI / Chiostro del Gioiello (Cloister of the Jewel) / Palazzo Altemps / Rome National Museum. 

NFT / AMOR x 1 - CORNER / Immaterial Gold / Blender / Digital Landscape / Top Left Corner. 

PHYSICAL / AMOR x 1 / Gold High-gloss PVD Grade #10 / Stainless Steel / Millimetric UV print / Magnetic Hanging System / 1m x 1,20m / October 2022 / Rome National Museum.

/ Stephan Breuer /
